content.description:
Vidit autem vir omnium sapientissimus in magno 
se forefore = futurum esse periculo, nisi quid providissetprovideo, -ere = paro, -are, propter 
avaritiamavaritia, -ae, f.: greediness GraecorumGraecus, -a, -um, adj.: Greek. Magnam enim secum 
pecuniam portabat.
content.question: In the passage, what is the meaning of quid?

unit.text: 3: Pliny's Letters: Ghosts and Apparitions, Letters to Trajan and Calpurnia, and Teacher's Choice - Latin Prose

skill.text: 1.A: Identify the meaning of Latin words and phrases.
